alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Floyd; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:27PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Gilmer, southern Murray, Floyd, Gordon, northwestern Pickens and western Bartow Counties through 200 PM EST... At 127 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Ramhurst to near Cave Spring, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Calhoun, Chatsworth, Ellijay, Adairsville, Euharlee, Cave Spring, Kingston, East Ellijay, Resaca, Plainville, Taylorsville, Shannon, Cassville, Fairmount, Ranger, Pinson, Redbud, Folsom and Oakman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for north central and northwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EST for northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bartow; Floyd; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens
